title: Magdalena Bay Announce 2025 Imaginal Mystery Tour Dates
description: The duo will continue to support Imaginal Disk with North American shows in the spring
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The duo will continue to support Imaginal Disk with North American shows in the spring
text: Magdalena Bay are extending their Imaginal Mystery Tour into 2025. Mica Tenenbaum and Matthew Lewin will perform in Australia in March before returning to North America for concerts in April and May. Supporting the experimental pop duo at most of the spring shows is Sam Austins. See Magdalena Bay’s tour dates below.Magdalena Bay announced the Imaginal Mystery Tour in May, in conjunction with the release of the single “Death & Romance.” They began the tour in September, not long after issuing their sophomore album, Imaginal Disk.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Magdalena Bay are extending their Imaginal Mystery Tour into 2025. Mica Tenenbaum and Matthew Lewin will perform in Australia in March before returning to North America for concerts in April and May. Supporting the experimental pop duo at most of the spring shows is Sam Austins. See Magdalena Bay’s tour dates below.

Magdalena Bay announced the Imaginal Mystery Tour in May, in conjunction with the release of the single “Death & Romance.” They began the tour in September, not long after issuing their sophomore album, Imaginal Disk.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Magdalena Bay: Imaginal Mystery Tour
